name: The bizarre of the beauty III
description:
In the piece I deal with a concept that I have already dealt with in other pieces, the beautiful and the bizarre. According to Charles Baudeliere "the beautiful is always bizarre. What is not slightly deformed presents a useless aspect".  
The piece is a dreamlike representation of the soul, of the individual where the bizarre and the beautiful oppose each other but depend on each other to create something unique, that is why we are all extraordinary beings.
